subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Seimone Augustus scored 36 points to lead Minnesota’s second-half surge Wednesday night, and the Lynx moved within one win of their first W.N.B.A. title by beating the Atlanta Dream, 101-95.
snippet: Seimone Augustus scored 36 points to lead Minnesota’s second-half surge Wednesday night, and the Lynx moved within one win of their first W.N.B.A. title by beating the Atlanta Dream, 101-95.
